
Alice reused the same prime for two different RSA keys by mistake. She encrypted a secret with both. Can you recover it?
291241541946619148530795903700981103000606323195597652378612257298758154571326545276369007386980901506597850170537796213039187257957219834358331126486847196885730576520133063274819795029704097345810685060996956796261901261683492742


The flag format is flag{...}
n=731767941149710253790206293954673249767457567126386996937202793198821364718370866711457638271084133348125400772732338675254753453377643845695553118773820280270884000890211346617627463235970622299881677006030406509037848957451308729, e=304141499552196580483744226771621451791140167892651260525450893229949078979201207106362602978236791900009912881229319111090464456709752654631202996741364635942526780500263744522426765183493454634977345773662824768700134967515599311

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{re47zbom}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 291241541946619148530795903700981103000606323195597652378612257298758154571326545276369007386980901506597850170537796213039187257957219834358331126486847196885730576520133063274819795029704097345810685060996956796261901261683492742
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=731767941149710253790206293954673249767457567126386996937202793198821364718370866711457638271084133348125400772732338675254753453377643845695553118773820280270884000890211346617627463235970622299881677006030406509037848957451308729, e=304141499552196580483744226771621451791140167892651260525450893229949078979201207106362602978236791900009912881229319111090464456709752654631202996741364635942526780500263744522426765183493454634977345773662824768700134967515599311
extra_info: p=27051209606036293729241768397095813308989322159370994425158693094546643041463659977105847187250910690893737226802027, q=27051209606036293729241768397095813308989322159370994425158693094546643041463659977105847187250910690893737226802027, Ï†(n)=731767941149710253790206293954673249767457567126386996937202793198821364718370866711457638271084133348125400772732284572835541380790185362158758927147202301626565258901361029231438369949887694979927465311655904687656061482997704676
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
